API reference¶

Aspatial Indices¶

aspatial.Dissim(data, group_pop_var, …) Classic Dissimilarity Index
aspatial.Gini_Seg(data, group_pop_var, …) Classic Gini Segregation Index
aspatial.Entropy(data, group_pop_var, …) Classic Entropy Index
aspatial.Isolation(data, group_pop_var, …) Classic Isolation Index
aspatial.Exposure(data, group_pop_var, …) Classic Exposure Index
aspatial.Atkinson(data, group_pop_var, …) Classic Atkinson Index
aspatial.Correlation_R(data, group_pop_var, …) Classic Correlation Ratio Index
aspatial.Con_Prof(data, group_pop_var, …) Concentration Profile Index
aspatial.Modified_Dissim(data, …[, iterations]) Calculation of Modified Dissimilarity index
aspatial.Modified_Gini_Seg(data, …[, …]) Calculation of Modified Gini Segregation index
aspatial.Bias_Corrected_Dissim(data, …[, B]) Calculation of Bias Corrected Dissimilarity index
aspatial.Density_Corrected_Dissim(data, …) Calculation of Density Corrected Dissimilarity index

Spatial Indices¶

spatial.Spatial_Prox_Prof(data, …[, m]) Calculation of Spatial Proximity Profile
spatial.Spatial_Dissim(data, group_pop_var, …) Calculation of Spatial Dissimilarity index
spatial.Boundary_Spatial_Dissim(data, …[, …]) Calculation of Boundary Spatial Dissimilarity index
spatial.Perimeter_Area_Ratio_Spatial_Dissim(…) Calculation of Perimeter/Area Ratio Spatial Dissimilarity index
spatial.Spatial_Isolation(data, …[, …]) Calculation of Spatial Isolation index
spatial.Spatial_Exposure(data, …[, alpha, …]) Calculation of Spatial Exposure index
spatial.Spatial_Proximity(data, …[, …]) Calculation of Spatial Proximity index
spatial.Absolute_Clustering(data, …[, …]) Calculation of Absolute Clustering index
spatial.Relative_Clustering(data, …[, …]) Calculation of Relative Clustering index
spatial.Delta(data, group_pop_var, total_pop_var) Calculation of Delta index
spatial.Absolute_Concentration(data, …) Calculation of Absolute Concentration index
spatial.Relative_Concentration(data, …) Calculation of Relative Concentration index
spatial.Absolute_Centralization(data, …[, …]) Calculation of Absolute Centralization index
spatial.Relative_Centralization(data, …[, …]) Calculation of Relative Centralization index

Multigroup Indices¶

aspatial.Multi_Dissim(data, groups) Calculation of Multigroup Dissimilarity index
aspatial.Multi_Gini_Seg(data, groups) Calculation of Multigroup Gini Segregation index
aspatial.Multi_Normalized_Exposure(data, groups) Calculation of Multigroup Normalized Exposure index
aspatial.Multi_Information_Theory(data, groups) Calculation of Multigroup Information Theory index
aspatial.Multi_Relative_Diversity(data, groups) Calculation of Multigroup Relative Diversity index
aspatial.Multi_Squared_Coefficient_of_Variation(…) Calculation of Multigroup Squared Coefficient of Variation index
aspatial.Multi_Diversity(data, groups[, …]) Calculation of Multigroup Diversity index
aspatial.Simpsons_Concentration(data, groups) Calculation of Simpson’s Concentration index
aspatial.Simpsons_Interaction(data, groups) Calculation of Simpson’s Interaction index
aspatial.Multi_Divergence(data, groups) Calculation of Multigroup Divergence index

Profile Wrappers¶

profile.Profile_Aspatial_Segregation(data, …) Perform point estimation of selected Aspatial segregation measures at once
profile.Profile_Spatial_Segregation(data, …) Perform point estimation of selected spatial segregation measures at once
profile.Profile_Segregation(data, …) Perform point estimation of selected segregation measures at once

Inference Wrappers¶

inference.Infer_Segregation(seg_class[, …]) Perform inference for a single segregation measure
inference.Compare_Segregation(seg_class_1, …) Perform inference comparison for a two segregation measures

Decomposition¶

decomposition.Decompose_Segregation(index1, …) Decompose segregation differences into spatial and attribute components.
